    • Class tetris.Game

      class Game extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • addName
          JLabel addName
          Reference of the "ADD NAME:" label

          boolean gameEnded
          Boolean which means if a game has already ended since starting the application
        • gameField
          GameField gameField
          Reference of the game's game field object
        • gameOver
          JButton gameOver
          Reference of the "GAME OVER!" button
        • gf
          GameForm gf
          Reference of the game's frame
        • holder
          JPanel holder
          Reference of the placeholder panel for requesting name
        • name
          String name
          Reference of the user's name
        • namePlace
          JTextField namePlace
          Reference of the text field for the user's name
        • score
          Score score
          Reference of the game's score object
        • scores
          ArrayList<ScoreRecord> scores
          Reference of the list of the score records
        • timer
          TimerThread timer
          Reference of the game's timer thread object as a panel

          Thread timerThread
          Reference of the game's timer thread object as a thread

    • Class tetris.Tetromino

      class Tetromino extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • block
          int[][] block
          The blocks of the tetromino 1 means if there is a block at that place 0 if there is not
        • color
          Color color
          The color of the tetromino
        • name
          String name
          Name of the tetromino
        • rotation
          int rotation
          The state of the tetromino's rotation, there is always 4 state
        • shapes
          int[][][] shapes
          The different shapes of each rotation
        • x
          int x
          The x coordinate of the tetromino's top left corner
        • y
          int y
          The y coordinate of the tetromino's top left corner
